allow: Bash(timeout 5 bash -c "while ! netstat -ano | findstr :5001 > /dev/null 2>&1; do sleep 0.5; done; echo ''Server started''")
Bash(timeout 5 bash -c "while ! netstat -ano | findstr :5001 > /dev/null 2>&1; do sleep 0.5; done; echo ''Server started successfully''")
Bash(timeout 5 bash -c "while ! netstat -ano | findstr :5001 > /dev/null 2>&1; do sleep 0.5; done; echo ''Server ready!''")
Bash(timeout 10 bash -c "while ! netstat -ano | findstr :5001 > /dev/null 2>&1; do sleep 0.5; done; echo ''Сервер готов!''")
